State.Author: B42
State.Description: A Metro-inspired wrist watch that shows you things like time.
State.Name: B42 Wristwatch

State.Author: LightLeaf476 - ThisMalkavian - backstept - AgentFuse
State.Description: Brave the dangers at Quarry Junction to add a unique and powerful armor to your Courier's collection.
State.Name: Courier's Road Armor

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A collection of small vanilla-friendly gameplay improvements that have been fully merged, updated, and cleaned.
State.Name: Essential Vanilla Enhancements Merged

State.Author: Audixas
State.Description: Handcraft lets you craft simple recipes by hand! Simply press a key and craft away!
State.Name: Handcraft

State.Author: Tau34RUS
State.Description: Replaces vanila textures. No new meshes, just awesome textures.
State.Name: Improved Robots Textures

State.Author: d_ivanov
State.Description: With increased functionality, read long description
State.Name: Leather backpack

State.Author: TheFourthHorse
State.Description: Adds six new rugged and worn in looking races to the game.
State.Name: TFH Rugged Race

Original.Name: YUP - Base Game and All DLC-51664-12-6-1672072862.7z

State.Author: Yukichigai - Currently maintained by sandbox
State.Description: A compilation of vital bug fixes for Fallout: New Vegas and its DLC, all combined into one ESM.  The only pure bug fix compilation available on the Nexus: no new features, no balance tweaks, no restored content.  Just bug fixes and nothing but bug fixes.  Available in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Russian.
State.Name: Yukichigai Unofficial Patch - YUP

State.Author: Dj Mystro
State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.
State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Author: Slippy
State.Description: Adds helmet overlays similar to those found in various S.T.A.L.K.E.R. mods.
State.Name: Helmet Overlay

State.Author: WebbProductions2020 Sweet6Shooter and many others
State.Description: Hello folks!!! The mod that you have all waited for around a year for is finally out. With over 32 weapons added to your New Vegas game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Classic Fallout Weapons Remastered

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

State.Author: B42
State.Description:
Drop empty and/or partial magazines on reload.

With one round staying in the chamber!
State.Name: B42 Dropmag and One in the chamber

State.Author: MadAce
State.Description: A mod that improves collision meshes.
State.Name: Collision Meshes

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - WallSoGB
State.Description: Increases the resolution of local maps from 128 to 512 and optionally 1024.
State.Name: High Res Local Maps

State.Author: weijiesen
State.Description: Professional quality Ballistic VFX overhaul. Bullet Holes match ammo, casings match ammo, new custom particle effects impacts.
State.Name: IMPACT

State.Author: emoose
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that almost completely fixes the exterior lighting bug, and allows up to 4x the number of active lights!
State.Name: Improved Lighting Shaders

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod simulates the real-world, adverse effects of continuous, intensive fire which, if sustained long enough, can cause a firearm to overheat. An overheated weapon will gradually become extremely unreliable and much more prone to malfunctioning (jamming); Its accuracy will suffer, and its condition will begin to deteriorate much faster.
State.Name: JIP Realistic Weapon Overheating

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks and Engine Fixes

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This library will replace the in-game heap with a faster, more optimized version. It should decrease load times, remove some stutter and slightly improve frame rate.
State.Name: New Vegas Heap Replacer

State.Author: RoyBatty and SciRika
State.Description: Optimizations and fixes for a large selection of meshes in the base game and DLC.
State.Name: New Vegas Mesh Improvement Mod - NVMIM

Original.Name: NMCs Textures NV LARGE Pack Part 3 of 3 FOR NMM-43135-1-0.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description: Fallout New Vegas Texture pack by NeilMc_NMC: re-textures roads, trees, landscape, vehicles buildings and interiors with high-resolution photographic based equivalent textures. Global texture replacer. Does not retexture the DLC.
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_For_New_Vegas

State.Author: NutnOff
State.Description: Nut Vegas - Nutscapes the Landscape retexture. The beginning to the Nut Vegas Project, Covers both Fallout 3 and New Vegas and all DLCs of both games
State.Name: Nut Vegas - Landscapes

State.Author: Bale
State.Description: Another Based drop for you fellas who refuse to move on from this aging game, replacing a handful of assets, this one's a little more disorganized.
State.Name: Physically Based Collection

State.Author: Bale
State.Description: Another compilation to start the year off, now with incredible but unnecessary detailed spoons, sporks, and forks...
State.Name: Physically Based Kitchenware

State.Author: AgentFuse
State.Description: A small mod that lets the player walk up to the Sierra Madre, rather than just teleporting into the lobby.
State.Name: Sierra Madre Grand Entrance

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Anro
State.Description: Allow to Create MCM Menu trough a INI
State.Name: UX Toolkit

State.Author: vurt and Marcurios
State.Description: 100+ new desert types of trees and plants. 3D LODS! Better looking grass. New terrain textures (optional).
State.Name: Wasteland Flora and Terrain Overhaul

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhauls various aspects of water in New Vegas to add more variety, make radiation-free water more scarce, and increase difficulty. Includes a highly compatible water bottling system allowing you to fill empty bottles at any water source.
State.Name: Water Overhaul

State.Author: dragbody on behalf of Fallout modding community
State.Description: Adds many updated models and textures for vanilla creatures and armors using assets from popular mod authors.
State.Name: 10 Year Anniversary Celebration Pack

State.Author: 6IX
State.Description: 170+ Hi-Res textures for “clutter” items (chems, consumables, skill books, bobbleheads, etc.). Made completely from scratch.
State.Name: 6IXES Clutter Texture Pack NV Edition

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Threw everything I had into one pack to celebrate 10 years of... this.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader
State.Description: Fixed camera jumps, animation snapping, movement lock, broken aim in 3rd person.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack - General Bugfix

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the apple clutter mesh and texture with compatibility for Animated Ingestibles.
State.Name: Awesome Apples

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora
State.Description: Not cars
State.Name: B42 Bows

State.Author: B42 Team and fantastic Fallout New Vegas community
State.Description:
Adds descriptions to all items in the game. For extra roleplaying experience.

This mod is community-driven and is part of the Project B42

Contributions are welcome!
State.Name: B42 Descriptions aka Pip-Info

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora and Hitman47101
State.Description:
This mod adds brand new, modern throwing weapons mechanic, as seen in Metro, COD, Fallout 4 and some other FPS games.

The aim was to make it look and feel like it was always in the game.

This mod is part of the Project B42
State.Name: B42 Quickthrow - an alternative grenade hotkey mod

State.Author: QwibQwib
State.Description: A remake of my Canvas Backpacks from last year. New models and textures, along with more faction and color variants
State.Name: Canvas Backpacks - Remade

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a interface overhaul that cleans up all of the smudgy Icons and the textures surrounding the Companion Wheel while retaining the original design as much as possible.
State.Name: Clean Companion Wheel

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the carrot clutter mesh and texture with compatibility for Animated Ingestibles.
State.Name: Crunchy Carrots

State.Description: Animations for the classics.

State.Description: Victor is a cowboy robot, now he has the hat(s) to match.

State.Description: All my kNVSE anim sets thus far in one place.

State.Description: A lot of anims.

State.Description: Replaces vanila textures. No new meshes, just awesome textures.

A collection of my mods, merged for convenience.

State.Description: A overhaul of the Gameplay UI

State.Author: Bale
State.Description: The New Vegas Community has a handful of retextures and replacers. texture packs, and overhauls, but even those cant cover everything, especially the nastiest, most ugliest assets NV has to offer, so over the months, I've casually been replacing the models that have bothered me the most. Yes, I'm aware this is extremely OCD.
State.Name: Micro Clutter

State.Description: Massive update to classic style heavy power armor mod that adds lots of new content, new features, optimizations, and native TTW support.

State.Description: 100+ new desert types of trees and plants. 3D LODS! Better looking grass. New terrain textures (optional).

State.Description: Fixes for mesh errors, uv errors, incorrect flags, missing extra data, form lists, projectiles, and other weapon related bugs and errors.

State.Description: An HD 2K weapon retexture pack that aims to update all of the weapon textures of NV to a new era

State.Description: Sorting mod, using features of yUI to make inventory management a better experience.

State.Description: AWSOME is a modern recreation of All Weapon Sounds Overhaul that offers improved compatibility and various enhancements and fixes.

State.Description: Drastically improves performance on The Strip by getting rid of... water LOD
State.Name: Aqua Performa - Strip Performance Fix

State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Description: Attempt to fix Elijah's voice loudness and clipping issues in Dead Money.
State.Name: Elijah Voice Audio Files Fix

State.Description: New movement anims by yours truly.
State.Name: Hit - Locomotion

State.Author: Tau34RUS
State.Description: Replaces vanila textures. No new meshes, just awesome textures.
State.Name: Improved Robots Textures

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: JSawyer's popular mod, fully re-implemented from the ground up. Compatibility has been greatly improved, errors have been fixed, and balance corrections have been expanded - all whilst trying to maintain the original mod's vision.
State.Name: JSawyer Ultimate Edition

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: Pursue high-risk/high-reward bounties in the first installment of the The Someguy Series.
State.Name: New Vegas Bounties I LE

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Legacy Reborn aims to overhaul all landscape (and more) textures across both Fallout 3 and New Vegas, while retaining their vanilla essence.
State.Name: Legacy Reborn Texture Pack

State.Author: Qolore7 - Moburma - Schizofriendlia
State.Description: Modern recreation of Strip Open, featuring many bug fixes, occlusion panes, and fixed meshes to deliver a much more stable, performance friendly, and bug free experience
State.Name: Simple Open Strip

State.Author: dragbody porting TheFriedTurkey assets
State.Description: This mod adds TheFriedTurkey's cazadores, giant ants, and securitrons as replacers for the vanilla models in the original New Vegas game.
State.Name: TheFriedTurkey 3 Creature Pack

State.Author: llamaRCA and Nivea
State.Description: Willow is not the usual girl companion. She is a story-driven character with over 1200 lines of voiced dialogue. She enriches your gameplay experience with her complex companion behaviors and her responses to the gameworld.
State.Name: Willow - A Better Companion Experience

State.Author: FalloutKid14 Audixas
State.Description: AWSOME is a modern recreation of All Weapon Sounds Overhaul that offers improved compatibility and various enhancements and fixes.
State.Name: All Weapon Sounds Overhaul Modern Edition - AWSOME

State.Author: Stentorious
State.Description: Patches B42 Dropmag for various New Vegas mods. Including A World of Pain, New Vegas Bounties I LE, and more! Updated to add missing magazines and more accurate collision.
State.Name: B42 Dropmag NV Patches

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: Frozen - Visualcore
State.Description: I dreamed all my life of a sexy walking animation in New Vegas so I had to do it myself. Animations are applied to the female player character and female NPCs.
State.Name: Frozen 3rd Person Feminine Movement

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: Frozen - Visualcore
State.Description: Male Movement. Yes :pepeglare:
State.Name: Frozen 3rd Person Masculine Movement

State.Author: Bale
State.Description:
Ever just patrol around the mojave, bored? you go check out a playground to see if you could kill some time, but then you're met with the ugliest, most heinous concoction that bethesda came up with?

fear no more, another based installment for your unnecessary needs.
State.Name: Physically Based Parkware

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Xilandro Axeuora
State.Description: This mod adds a fully animated ammunition and weapon condition checking system to the game, complete with 35 scratch made animations and a custom HUD element
State.Name: B42 Inspect - aka Animated Ammo and Weapon Condition Checking

State.Author: Quicksilver500
State.Description: A comprehensive overhaul of the 3rd Person Camera. Adds many modern camera features, including shoulder swapping, Scope toggling, smooth interactive camera movement, and a fully fleshed out customisable camera positioning menu!
State.Name: 3rd Person Camera Overhaul

State.Author: Cipscis with MCM support added by Gribbleshnibit8
State.Description: Redesigned CASM now using the MCM for configuration. Includes several of the optional save conditions from the Fallout 3 version of the mod.
State.Name: CASM with MCM

State.Author: LogicDragon
State.Description: This is a NVSE plugin that enables a visible body and player shadows when in first person. Also, any points where the game force switches to 3rd person (sitting/knockout/death, etc.) are now in 1st person.
State.Name: New Vegas - Enhanced Camera

State.Author: Nehred - Sigerious
State.Description: Plays animations when interacting with objects, opening/closing doors and picking up items.
State.Name: Animated Player Interactions

State.Author: Stentorious
State.Description: Patches B42 Dropmag for various New Vegas mods. Including A World of Pain, New Vegas Bounties I LE, and more! Updated to add missing magazines and more accurate collision.
State.Name: B42 Dropmag NV Patches

State.Author: DavidJCobb and llde
State.Description: A DLL that logs raw crash data -- the instruction pointer, x86 register values, and an attempt at identifying the source DLL (and instruction pointer relative to its module base).
State.Name: Crash Logger

State.Author: carxt - lStewieAl - c6
State.Description: PLAY THE GUITAR, PLAY IT AGAIN, MY JOHNNYYYYYYYYYYYY.
State.Name: JohnnyGuitar NVSE

State.Author: Asterra
State.Description: Does away with the decade-old, unintended issue of "glowing" objects in ENB by tweaking over 1,400 vanilla files.  Glowing bottles, glowing weapons, glowing armor, glowing walls, glowing xander roots, glowing fish, glowing windows, glowing grass, glowing shadows... Care was lavished to ensure this project is as thorough as can be.
State.Name: ENB Glowing Objects Overhaul

State.Author: zedas
State.Description: An enhancement to the shoddy work on the vanilla functional streetlamps & lights of Outer Vegas, Camp McCarran, Camp Golf, and NCRCF.
State.Name: A Little More Lamplight

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: The last companion you'll ever need.
State.Name: Bad Mothafucka LE

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A simple and comprehensive loot scarcity mod using event-based scripting. Trust us. Bring a magazine.
State.Name: Famine - A Loot Rarity Mod

State.Author: doodlez Weijesen
State.Description: A subtle heat distortion effect using the refraction shader, which smoothly fades in and out depending on weather conditions and time of day.
State.Name: Heat Haze

State.Description: Files needed while following the "Viva New Vegas" guide.

State.Description: An updated and refined selection of bugfixes (mostly) requiring NVSE.

State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, DLC support, and optional presets for Reshade and ENB.

State.Author: lStewieAl - Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Increases the render resolution of in-game screens (Pipboy, terminals, character creation menu) to match game's screen resolution.
State.Name: High Resolution Screens

State.Author: Nihilisaurus
State.Description:
NPCs react to encountering the dead bodies of their friends for a short while after death, and for a brief window will put two and two together to conclude the player had killed a friendly.



Written using Event Handlers with no scripted AI packages or package changes.
State.Name: Your Buddy Is Dead - Dynamic Dead Detection

State.Author: Xilandro x Carxt x JazzIsParis
State.Description: This mod, thanks to JazzIsParis magic, adds diagonal movement. Simple as that.
State.Name: Diagonal movement

State.Description: it makes most of the picket fences look good with new texture.
State.Name: High Quality Picket Fences

State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Author: Roy Batty - LuthienAnarion
State.Description: Simple patcher to make Fallout New Vegas 4GB Aware. Supports all known Steam and GoG versions. The Bethesda.net and XBOX Game pass versions are NOT supported since NVSE will not support them either.
State.Name: FNV 4GB Patcher

State.Author: Roy Batty - Luthien Anarion
State.Description: Fixes the weapon repair kit to work correctly on weapons that have a durability mod. Also fixes the sound played, the item type, and supports Fallout 3 repair option of JIPLN.
State.Name: Weapon Repair Kit Repaired

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the maize clutter mesh and texture with compatibility for Animated Ingestibles.
State.Name: Marvelous Maize

State.Author: Made by ElPascal - v1 61 kindly provided by Kazopert
State.Description: This mod adds hundreds of npcs and several scripted events to the world of Fallout: New Vegas; people patrolling the roads, traveling between towns, occupying locations, exploring the desert and reacting dynamically to your choices throughout the game. The Mojave will never feel empty again.
State.Name: The Living Desert - Travelers Patrols Consequences Increased Population and more

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds balanced vanilla-style backpacks and an expandable scripted framework that allows backpacks to take damage from combat.
State.Name: Better Balanced Backpacks

State.Author: doodlez karut FadingSignal
State.Description: Rain fixes and improvements powered by Climate Control NVSE. Supports 3D Rain.
State.Name: Climate Control - Rain

Original.Name: Sierra Madre Grand Entrance - Desert Natural Weathers Patch-78104-1-0-1661309931.rar

State.Author: A1ienAtomz
State.Description: Simple patch to make Sierra Madre Grand Entrance's worldspace look as it should when using Desert Natural Weathers.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers- SIerra Madre Grand Entrance Patch

State.Author: NuclearForest
State.Description: Adds "New" 10 Female and 4 Male haircuts.  The aim of the mod, as the name suggests, is to expand quite slim selection of hairstyles provided by the vanilla game. Small clippings and seams are to be expected, but hey, it doesnt get any more vanilla than that. Hats and glasses should work, but exactly how good they work i'll leave to your judgment.
State.Name: Mo'Hair - Vanilla Haircuts Expansion

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the fire hydrant mesh and texture.
State.Name: Fantastic Fire Hydrants

State.Author: seldalore
State.Description: 3 flavors: less accurate, much less accurate, and drunk.
State.Name: Inaccurate NPCs - ESPless - De-aimbotting the Wasteland

State.Author: Dj Mystro
State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.
State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: Work for Bobby Bass as a contract killer in this fully-voiced quest mod! Tiddies and biscuits.
State.Name: New Vegas Killer LE

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks and Engine Fixes

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A simple categories config targeting only the most clutter-prone item types.
State.Name: ySI Sorting Icons - Push's Categories

State.Author: pommymax
State.Description: 4K retextures of True Police Stories, Lad's Life, and ¡La Fantoma!, free for use.
State.Name: PM's Magazine Resources

State.Author: Qolore 7 - Anro24
State.Description: Simple scripted interior lighting overhaul. Automatically works with any mod
State.Name: Simple Interior Lighting Overhaul

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the first person meshes and textures for eating beans using Animated Ingestibles.
State.Name: Better Beans for Animated Ingestibles

State.Author: Xilandro x Carxt x JazzIsParis
State.Description: This mod, thanks to JazzIsParis magic, adds diagonal movement. Simple as that.
State.Name: Diagonal movement

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description:
Adds an MCM menu with options for adjust World Field of View, Player Field of View, Pipboy Field of View and Terminal Screen Field of View.

Also allows adjusting the Scope Scissor Amount, Weapon FOV Ratio, FOV Zoom time, Dialogue Zoom time and Dialogue delay time.
State.Name: FOV Slider

State.Author: Nivea
State.Description:
I was always put off by the fact that 90% of the population seemed to wear the exact same armor/clothing this mod aims to try and lessen this issue by adding more clothing/armor variety.



Robert body and Breeze body and Type 3 supported.
State.Name: Spice of Life - Variety Armor and Clothing Robert Breeze Type3

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.
State.Name: Combat Lag Fix (NVSE)

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds ammo variants, reloading parts, and weapon mods as loot; fixes item naming conventions; improves recipes; and adds options for configuring GRA. Compatible with mods which add new weapons and weapon mods, without the need for a patch.
State.Name: Mojave Arsenal

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Fixes Pip-Boy's shading, making it not ignore lights around it
State.Name: Pip-Boy Shading Fix NVSE

State.Author: Dragbody Hermit85 and AlexScorpion
State.Description:
This mod provides high resolution texture replacers for both vanilla or breeze male bodies.



Textures by AlexScorpion (commissioned by Dragbody and Hermit85)
State.Name: High Resolution Male Body Textures

State.Author: Dj Mystro
State.Description: Adds about 170 new & intense locations to the wasteland filled with enemies and loot. They vary from small Gas Stations to huge maze-like sewers and derelict factories. Adds several days of new gameplay possibilities. Filled with quests, NPCs with dialogue, vendors and some of the toughest enemies you will ever encounter.
State.Name: A World Of Pain

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Prevents the game becoming too easy by making enemies more likely to target the player in combat rather than companions.
State.Name: Player Combat Priority

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description:
NVSE plugin that aims to fix UI bugs and add new UI features. 

Sorting Icons and more!
State.Name: yUI - User Ynterface

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the traffic cone mesh and texture.
State.Name: Terrific Traffic Cones

State.Author: RoyBatty Audixas
State.Description: BLEEDLESS is a lighter version of RoyBatty's excellent BLEED mod. It retains most changes relating to damage while removing its more intrusive changes.
State.Name: BLEEDLESS

State.Author: doodlez l00
State.Description: A cloud shadows effect powered by Climate Control NVSE.
State.Name: Cloud Shadows

State.Author: Fallout2AM
State.Description: A mod which allows custom hair / eyes / race mods to live happy all together, without conflicting. Now ESPLess thanks to JIP LN ScriptRunner.
State.Name: Hair Patcher Two ESPLess

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 1000+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

State.Author: Various
State.Description: A skeleton with compatibility for the latest mods
State.Name: NV Compatibility Skeleton

State.Author: doodlez l00
State.Description: A cloud shadows effect powered by Climate Control NVSE.
State.Name: Cloud Shadows

State.Author: Anro
State.Description: Change the Collapsed Tunnel to behave as Exterior instead of using Fake Sky.
State.Name: DN Weather - Lonesome Road Collapsed Tunnel Fix

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername and Kazopert
State.Description: A stripped down version of FPGE that doesn't alter the game's world after the Second Battle of Hoover Dam.
State.Name: FPGEL - Functional Post Game Ending Lite

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora
State.Description: Enables headtracking for the player character.
State.Name: Player Headtracking

State.Author: Someguy
State.Description: This is the master file required for all of Someguy2000's quest mods.
State.Name: The Someguy Series

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the pear clutter mesh and texture with compatibility for Animated Ingestibles.
State.Name: Prettier Pears

State.Author: MadMonkey119
State.Description: Improves the potato clutter mesh and texture with compatibility for Animated Ingestibles.
State.Name: Perfect Potatoes

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Fixes moonlight, making the moon the light caster instead of the sun.
State.Name: MoonlightNVSE

State.Author: NutnOff and Scott Clam
State.Description: Overhauls the visuals for main bodies of water in New Vegas. TTW compatible.
State.Name: Nut Water Overhaul

Original.Name: Better Benches - Workbenches Retextured v1.1 (Glossiness fix)-76321-v1-1-1651513264.zip

State.Author: ayrenv
State.Description: This mod retextures the workbench and the reloading bench.
State.Name: Better Benches - Workbenches Retextured

State.Author: lastR4NG3R
State.Description: VICE is a project that aims to fill out some harshly neglected areas in Vegas to have a more "close to concept" appearance.
State.Name: VICE - Visuals Improved Content Expanded

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Dynamically adjusts draw distance in accordance with the fog to improve performance with little to no visual difference.
State.Name: Fog-based Object Culling

State.Author: Queue
State.Description: Implements structured exception handling and sanity checking to reduce frequency of game crashes.
State.Name: NVAC - New Vegas Anti Crash

State.Author: RoyBatty Audixas
State.Description: BLEEDLESS is a lighter version of RoyBatty's excellent BLEED mod. It retains most changes relating to damage while removing its more intrusive changes.
State.Name: BLEEDLESS

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhaul of New Vegas's raider factions, balancing their loot and adding more of them to fight.
State.Name: Mojave Raiders

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Quick Start for Fallout New Vegas, quickly generate a character and get out into the wasteland.
State.Name: New Vegas Quick Start

State.Author: tom2g0
State.Description: Adds palm trees with lights to the Strip.
State.Name: Strip Palm Trees

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Restores some cut but fully-functional NPCs to the Strip.
State.Name: The Strip NPCs Uncut - Content Restoration

State.Description: Patches for TTW and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (TTW)

State.Description: NVSE plugin which adds utilities and bug fixes for weather mods.
State.Name: Climate Control NVSE

State.Author: Carxt - Tgspy - lStewieAl
State.Description: The newest generation in performance enhancement and stutter fixing. Windows 10 compatible. Featuring fixes to the dreaded micro stutter, and a high FPS Havok fix.
State.Name: NVTF - New Vegas Tick Fix

Original.Name: Desert Natural Weathers NV - Essential DLC Enhancements Patch-71431-1-0-1664858832.7z

State.Author: KaptainCnucklz
State.Description: Random patches I made in xEdit for my own personal use. Because sharing is caring.
State.Name: Kaptain's Assorted New Vegas Patches

State.Author: castisass
State.Description: New 4k star texture and mesh using NASA satellite images to create a real-world accurate starfield for New Vegas.
State.Name: Accurate NASA Stars

State.Author: Frozen - Visualcore
State.Description: I dreamed all my life of a sexy walking animation in New Vegas so I had to do it myself. Animations are applied to the female player character and female NPCs.

State.Description: Just outside of New Vegas proper is a small estate owned by the Tops Chairman big cat Benny. Used mostly as an occasional vacation home to throw parties and hangout with other big names of New Vegas.
State.Name: Casa De New Vegas

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - Wall_SoGB - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following the "Viva New Vegas" guide.
